title: Why can't diamond be like gold?
body:
I fight diamond/master smurfs in gold elo and basically just afk farm and then run at them with youmuus and auto win.

I play in diamond and it's like watching  4 people that have potatoes for brains running around in circles, 2 people that belong there, 2 people are challengers  smurfing, 1 person that's incredibly high and has no idea wtf he's doing, but is probably doing something stupid like AP Olaf or AD Bard and however this cluster fuck sorts itself determines whether you win or lose.

I kid you not, I actually feel like I'm fighting/seeing more skilled people in gold shitter elo than I am in diamond. I don't know if it's because  the amount of smurfs down there is astronomically high right now, or if there are just that many people being boosted up to diamond, or a mixture of both. 

This is a really fucking confusing season.
